name: Sneaky Sneaky Boss Lair
description:
Where are you? And most importantly... who are you?

"Sneaky Sneaky Boss Lair" is a quick peek into the life of an Adventurer exploring the Demons' domain - coded as a simple text-only game in Python, so what you see is what you get. Or is it really?

Start by exploring two unknown rooms, solve short riddles, and eventually make your way to the boss of the place! Your own input will decide your fate.

The total gameplay time is around 5-10 minutes, which leaves plenty to come back here and leave any suggestions! Thank you in advance, and have fun playing!
